alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 01 at 3:33AM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills from 30 below to 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills from 20 below to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
